_notes.loglevel: Can be one of the value listed here: https://docs.python.org/3/library/logging.html#levels
_notes.website_listen_ip: IP Flask will listen on. Defaults to 0.0.0.0, meaning all interfaces.
_notes.systemd_service_name: (Optional) Name of the systemd service if your project has one.
_notes.lookyloo_url: The URL of the Lookyloo instance to use for the captures.
_notes.min_frequency: Do not schedule captures more often than this value (mist be an int, in seconds)
_notes.max_captures: Automatically expire the monitoring when this amount of captures has been triggered.
_notes.force_expire: If true, the expiring time will be set to a maximum of the frequency (provded by the user, or min_frequency if higher) * the max amount of captures.
_notes.users: It is some kind of an admin accounts. Format: {username: password}
_notes.email_smtp_auth: Email SMTP auth configuration to send notifications
